content.text:
Yes, your speech-to-text is working! I can see your message came through clearly, including the casual tone and the "uh" pause that's typical in spoken language. 

I noticed you mentioned "jet 2 holiday" - that sounds like you might be thinking about travel or vacation planning. Are you actually looking for help with holiday planning, or were you just using that as a test phrase for your speech-to-text system?

If you do need assistance with anything - whether it's work-related tasks, leisure planning, or anything else - I'm here to help route you to the right resources!
